page.title: 02POPULATION OF AREA
page.content: In our 'block' measuring 3km x 4km there are{111 people.}Of these 6 are under five years of age; 14 between the ages of 5 and 16; 69 between the ages of 16 and 65; and 22 old age pensioners. In one of our squares there are only five people all of which are over the age of 65.{One {fifth of the population}in our area are, in fact,{old age pensioners. There are{51 houses}in the 12 squares, {13 of which are unoccupied.}In one square of 8 houses, only 3 are occupied. On average there are two people to each house but there are 11 houses with four or more people living there. One house has 8 occupants. Most people in our area are farmers.
